website_summaries.verdict: A good everyday shampoo for those that suffer from dry, irritated scalps.
pros: Leaves hair looking healthy and hydrated
Notice results in as little as one use
cons: Some have said it dried out their hair

customer_reviews.title: Out performed prescription strength shampoo for scalp dermititis
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo cleared up two very bad cases of scalp dermititis in two of my daughters with very thick hair. Prescription strength shampoo hardly did anything. My third daughter with equally thick hair has used it as a preventative maintenance, and has had no problems. We're going on 8 or so years as fans of this product
customer_reviews.author: mommato5

customer_reviews.title: 80% cured my scalp psoriasis
customer_reviews.text: I'm always on the lookout for something -- ANYTHING -- to help my scalp itchiness and redness. I've found it in this shampoo/conditioner. I do have to shampoo every day, though, or else the dryness returns.
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Not moisturizing enough
customer_reviews.text: I think this does help my scalp but I can't use it daily. I have color treated hair (bleached) and my hair feels like straw if I combine this with the coordinating conditioner. The smell isn't overpowering - I have hypersensitive smell and it doesn't bother me. I wish it was a little more moisturizing. I guess that also might be part of the cause of seborrheic dermatitis can be the things that help moisturize but my hair can't handle the dryness.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Shampoo All Over!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had read in other reviews of the shampoo spilling inside the package it was shipped in. This also happened to me. It was a mess and I just ordered a replacement! The next shipment was neat and clean! The shampoo is thick in consistency and smells amazing! So far my family is enjoying using it.
customer_reviews.author: cv

customer_reviews.title: Finally relief!
customer_reviews.text: My 6yo daughter has a really dry/flaky scalp that itches her. This was recommended by a friend who is a hairdresser and its the first product we've used that actually worked and gave her relief. Got rid of the flakes (for the day) and she wasn't constantly scratching her scalp. She also said it had a cooling effect of her scalp that was really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: Product is great, shipping is poor
customer_reviews.text: I really like the shampoo works great. But both times I have ordered the cap has been unscrewed enough that the product leaks all over the inside of the bag the bottle is in. And in this shipment the bag actually broke and the product leaked all over the inside of the box and out the box onto the porch.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: My hairdresser suggested this shampoo for my four year old grandson to use on his cradle cap. My daughter has used so many products including olive oil and baby oil soaked into his scalp overnight, Tgel by Neutrogena and this is the only thing that’s worked! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: MO'M

customer_reviews.title: Best product I've found that helps with scalp acne
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product I've found that helps with scalp acne. I still get some, though not as much. The only downside is that your hair smells like spearmint gum.
customer_reviews.author: am1309

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived today and the lid was not on tight and it was open so it had leaked. I was disappointed since this was not cheap shampoo and my son has a scalp condition. Going to try it tonight, what is left in the bottle:(
customer_reviews.author: S. Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo! My beautician recommended it and I was satisfied with It after the first wash. She did recommends using it once a week to prevent drying out ends. I use on my scalp only and put oil on the ends after towel drying hair.
customer_reviews.author: Moopman

customer_reviews.title: Dry, weird scalp be gone!
customer_reviews.text: Was having a dry scalp and I tried everything, tea tree, head and shoulders and this definitely did the trick!

customer_reviews.title: Open in shipping

customer_reviews.title: made things worse!!! :/
customer_reviews.text: How can a product that claims to be sulphate-free, paraben-free and 100% vegan makes things worse!! so I have dandruff, this one doesn't claim to be anti-dandruff so I had not really expected to treat it even thought it says 'scalp wellness' but it made things terrible, such a waste of money! Also, the bottle had a dent when I received it, please re-consider the packaging. I wish I could claim a refund for this product because now I'm going to have to buy new shampoo and discontinue this one. On the bright side, it smells good, that's all

customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dry itchy scalp. I shampoo every other day and have been using this for 2 plus weeks and my scalp has only gotten worse. More itchy and now flaking too which it was not before.
